title: Revised permission : Any development permission granted earlier may be revised provided that, third party interest established in pursuance of such permissions, if any, are not adversely affected
clause_text: Revised permission : Any development permission granted earlier may be revised provided that, third party interest established in pursuance of such permissions, if any, are not adversely affected. In such case, consent of the adversely affected persons shall be necessary, if required under RERA. While granting the revised permission, the approved plans and commencement certificate of the earlier permission with office, shall be stamped as
